trans-unit.source: Specifies with an underscore the character that is used as the access key.
trans-unit.target: 指定要作為便捷鍵的含底線字元。

trans-unit.source: If your content has multiple underscore characters, only the first one is converted into an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey%2A>; the other underscores appear as normal text.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的內容有多個底線字元，只有第一個會轉換成<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey%2A>; 其他底線顯示為一般文字。

trans-unit.source: If the underscore that you want converted to the access key is not the first underscore, use two consecutive underscores for any underscores that precede the one that you want to convert.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要轉換為存取金鑰的底線字元不是第一個底線，使用兩個連續底線的任何之前，您想要轉換的底線。

trans-unit.source: For example, the following code contains an access key and displays as _Hello**W**orld:
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列程式碼包含的存取金鑰並將顯示為 _Hello**W**ogw:

trans-unit.source: Because the underscore that precedes H is a double, the W key registers as the access key.
trans-unit.target: 因為雙底線前面 H 即 W 鍵會註冊為存取金鑰。

trans-unit.source: To use <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText> as a content host in a control style, set <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.RecognizesAccessKey%2A> in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>, as this example shows:
trans-unit.target: 若要使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>控制項樣式中的內容主機，來設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter.RecognizesAccessKey%2A>中<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentPresenter>，如本範例所示：

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText> tag to create an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey%2A>; however, a tag is not necessary.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>標記建立<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey%2A>; 不過，不需要的標記。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create an access key with and without the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText> tag.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何建立便捷鍵時或無<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>標記。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Provides read-only access to the character that follows the first underline character.
trans-unit.target: 提供唯讀存取第一個底線字元之後的字元。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey%2A> property to programmatically determine which character is parsed by <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey%2A>屬性來以程式設計方式判斷哪一個字元由剖析<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager> registers the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey%2A> character and raises the <xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.AccessKeyPressed> event when users press the key.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager>註冊<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey%2A>字元和引發<xref:System.Windows.Input.AccessKeyManager.AccessKeyPressed>事件，當使用者按下索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The computed size that is used to arrange the content.
trans-unit.target: 所計算出用來排列內容的大小。

trans-unit.source: Arranges and sizes the content of an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 排列 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText" /> 物件的內容並為其調整大小。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" /> that fills the content area.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定填滿內容區域的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" /> that fills the content area.
The following example shows how to set properties in order to change the appearance of the text in an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以變更中文字的外觀<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that adjusts the baseline offset position of text in an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，這個值會調整 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText" /> 項目中文字的基準位移位置。

trans-unit.source: The amount to adjust the baseline offset position.
trans-unit.target: 要調整基準位移位置的數量。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], this value is a true double.
You cannot qualify this value by using measurement units such as picas or points.
trans-unit.target: 您無法使用例如 picas 或點的度量單位來限定這個值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font family to use with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要搭配 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText" /> 項目使用的字型系列。

trans-unit.source: The default is the font that is determined by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontFamily" /> metric.
trans-unit.target: 預設為 <see cref="P:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontFamily" /> 度量資訊 (Metric) 所決定的字型。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set properties in order to change the appearance of the text in an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以變更中文字的外觀<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font size to use with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要搭配 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText" /> 項目使用的字型大小。

trans-unit.source: The default is the font size that is determined by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontSize" /> metric.
trans-unit.target: 預設為 <see cref="P:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontSize" /> 度量資訊所決定的字型大小。

trans-unit.source: A string representation of a <xref:System.Double> value.
This value is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement.
Strings need not explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: 字串不需要明確地包含小數位數。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a value of `1`.
A *double* value that is followed by one of these unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.
trans-unit.target: A *double* ，後面接著這些單元宣告字串的其中一個值： `px`， `in`， `cm`， `pt`。

trans-unit.source: **Note** In many cases, you can set a double to `Auto`; however, you cannot set this property to `Auto`.
trans-unit.target: **請注意**在許多情況下，您可以將 double 設`Auto`; 不過，您無法將此屬性設定為`Auto`。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set properties to change the appearance of the text in an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何設定屬性，以變更中文字的外觀<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" /> property that selects a normal, condensed, or expanded font from a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FontStretch" /> 屬性，從 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.FontFamily" /> 中選取正常、壓縮或展開字型。

trans-unit.source: The relative degree that the font is stretched.
trans-unit.target: 字型自動縮放的相對度數。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font style to use with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要搭配 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText" /> 項目使用的字型樣式。

trans-unit.source: The font style to use; for example, normal, italic, or oblique.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的字型樣式，例如，正常、斜體或傾斜。

trans-unit.source: The default is determined by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontStyle" /> metric.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是由 <see cref="P:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontStyle" /> 度量資訊決定。

trans-unit.source: For more information and a list of font styles, see <xref:System.Windows.FontStyle>.
trans-unit.target: 如需字型樣式清單和詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.FontStyle>。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set properties in order to change the appearance of the text in an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何設定屬性以變更中文字的外觀<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the font weight to use with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要搭配 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText" /> 項目使用的字型粗細。

trans-unit.source: The default is determined by the <see cref="P:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontWeight" /> metric.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是由 <see cref="P:System.Windows.SystemFonts.MessageFontWeight" /> 度量資訊決定。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set properties to change the appearance of the text in an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何設定屬性，以變更中文字的外觀<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" /> that draws the text content of the element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定繪製項目文字內容的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Brush" /> that draws the text.
The following example shows how to set properties to change the appearance of the text in an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何設定屬性，以變更中文字的外觀<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The index of the visual child element to return.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回之視覺子項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of a visual child element.
trans-unit.target: 取得視覺子項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: Returns an integer that represents the index of a visual child element.
trans-unit.target: 傳回整數，表示視覺子項目的索引。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height of each line box.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定每個線條方塊的高度。

trans-unit.source: A double that specifies the height of each line box.
trans-unit.target: Double，指定每個線條方塊的高度。

trans-unit.source: This value must be equal to or greater than <c>0.0034</c> and equal to or less then <c>160000</c>.
trans-unit.target: 此值必須等於或大於<c>0.0034</c>而且等於或小於<c>160000</c>。

trans-unit.source: A value of <see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" /> (equivalent to an attribute value of <c>Auto</c>) causes the line height to be determined automatically from the current font characteristics.
trans-unit.target: 值為<see cref="F:System.Double.NaN" />(相當於屬性值的<c>自動</c>) 會使行高由目前字型特性自動決定。

trans-unit.source: Changing this value does not change the height of the associated text; instead, it changes the box that contains it.
trans-unit.target: 變更此值不會變更相關聯的文字; 的高度相反地，它會變更包含它的方塊。

trans-unit.source: To change the size of the text, use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.FontSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更文字大小，請使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.FontSize%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: A string representation of a <xref:System.Double> value.
This value is interpreted as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixel-md.md)] measurement.
Strings need not explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: 字串不需要明確地包含小數位數。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a value of `1`.
The same <xref:System.Double> range restrictions as mentioned in the Property Value section apply here.
trans-unit.target: 相同<xref:System.Double>屬性值 > 一節中所述的範圍限制適用於此處。

trans-unit.source: A *double* value that is followed by one of these unit declaration strings: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.
trans-unit.target: A *double* ，後面接著這些單元宣告字串的其中一個值： `px`， `in`， `cm`， `pt`。

trans-unit.source: If you programmatically set the *Auto* value, its value corresponds to <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您以程式設計方式設定*自動*值，其值會對應到<xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets how the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.LineHeight" /> property is enforced.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定強制執行 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.LineHeight" /> 屬性的方式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.LineStackingStrategy" /> value that determines the behavior of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.LineHeight" /> property.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.LineStackingStrategy" /> 值，決定 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.LineHeight" /> 屬性的行為。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.LineHeight%2A> properties control the line box that is reserved for text.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.LineHeight%2A> 屬性會控制保留文字行方塊。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.LineHeight%2A> allows users to set a suggestion of height.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.LineHeight%2A> 可讓使用者設定的建議高度。

trans-unit.source: You can set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.LineStackingStrategy%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.LineStackingStrategy.MaxHeight> or <xref:System.Windows.LineStackingStrategy.BlockLineHeight>.
The <xref:System.Windows.LineStackingStrategy.MaxHeight> value increases the line to the tallest object in the line.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.LineStackingStrategy.MaxHeight>值會增加的列列中最高的物件。

trans-unit.source: It ensures that no item overdraws or is trimmed.
trans-unit.target: 它可確保任何項目物件，或修剪。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.LineStackingStrategy.BlockLineHeight> value enforces a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.LineHeight%2A> value on all lines.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.LineStackingStrategy.BlockLineHeight>值會強制執行<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.LineHeight%2A>上所有行的值。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.LineHeight%2A> property does not provide sufficient space, the text is either overdrawn or trimmed.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.LineHeight%2A>屬性不提供足夠的空間、 透支或修剪文字時。

trans-unit.source: Which occurs depends on the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.ClipProperty> value.
Gets an enumerator that iterates the logical child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 取得可反覆查看 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText" /> 項目之邏輯子項目的列舉值。

trans-unit.source: An enumerator that iterates the logical child elements of this element.
trans-unit.target: 列舉值，可反覆查看此項目的邏輯子項目。

trans-unit.source: The maximum size limit for the control.
The return value cannot exceed this size.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值不能超過此大小。

trans-unit.source: Cannot exceed the maximum size limit for the control.
trans-unit.target: 不能超過控制項的大小上限。

trans-unit.source: The object to add to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText" />.
For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild.AddChild(System.Object)" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild.AddChild(System.Object)" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: The text to add to the object.
For a description of this member, see <see cref="M:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild.AddText(System.String)" />.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild.AddText(System.String)" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員是明確介面成員實作，

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild> interface.
trans-unit.target: 只有在 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText> 執行個體轉換成 <xref:System.Windows.Markup.IAddChild> 介面時，才能使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text that is displayed by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText" /> 項目所顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: The text without the first underscore character.
trans-unit.target: 不含第一個底線字元的文字。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string.
An access key is not created if you use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.Text%2A> property to supply text for an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText> element.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用，不會建立便捷鍵<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.Text%2A>屬性提供文字<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>項目。

trans-unit.source: This property is used internally to determine the text that is displayed by the access key.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性是在內部用來決定存取金鑰所顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to set additional text that does not contain the mnemonic (underlined character) or to retrieve the access key text.
trans-unit.target: 若要設定未包含的助憶鍵 （底線字元） 的其他文字，或擷取存取金鑰的文字，您可以使用這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the underscore character.
This value becomes an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText> that handles access keys for the *object*.
trans-unit.target: 這個值會成為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>控制代碼存取金鑰*物件*。

trans-unit.source: The access key is the character that immediately follows the underscore.
trans-unit.target: 存取金鑰是緊接在底線字元。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates an access key that customizes the first letter of the access key, which contains the mnemonic, and then sets the rest of the text by using the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.Text%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立自訂的存取金鑰，其中包含的助憶鍵，然後設定其餘的文字所使用的第一個字母的便捷鍵<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.Text%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the horizontal alignment of the content.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定內容的水平對齊。

trans-unit.source: The horizontal alignment of the text.
For a list of alignments see <xref:System.Windows.TextAlignment>.
Gets or sets the decorations that are added to the text of an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定加入至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText" /> 項目文字的裝飾。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.TextDecorations" /> applied to the text of an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText" />.
trans-unit.target: 套用至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.TextDecorations" /> 文字的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about text decorations, see <xref:System.Windows.TextDecorations>.
trans-unit.target: 如需文字裝飾的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.TextDecorations>。

trans-unit.source: This property is not typically set, either by using markup or code.
trans-unit.target: 通常不設定此屬性，使用標記或程式碼。

trans-unit.source: This property exposes the default decoration for an access key (an underline in the same text color as the text) for possible styling or programmatic change.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會公開預設裝飾，如便捷鍵 （在相同的文字色彩做為文字底線），以可能樣式或以程式設計方式變更。

trans-unit.source: Because users expect access key identifiers to have a certain appearance in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)], a better choice is to change this property by using application-wide mechanisms, such as application styles or custom themes.
trans-unit.target: 因為使用者預期存取具有特定的外觀的索引鍵識別碼[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]，較好的選擇是使用整個應用程式的機制，例如應用程式樣式或自訂佈景主題變更這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Use this syntax if you are defining custom text decorations.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要定義自訂文字裝飾的文字，請使用此語法。

trans-unit.source: For details, see [How to: Create a Text Decoration](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-create-a-text-decoration.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 建立文字裝飾](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/how-to-create-a-text-decoration.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the effects that are added to the text of an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText" /> element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定加入至 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText" /> 項目文字的效果。

trans-unit.source: This property is not typically set, either by using markup or code.
trans-unit.target: 通常不設定此屬性，使用標記或程式碼。

trans-unit.source: This property exposes the default effects for an access key for possible styling or programmatic change.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會公開預設的效果可能樣式或以程式設計方式變更的便捷鍵。

trans-unit.source: Because users expect access key identifiers to have a certain appearance in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)], a better choice is to change this property by using application-wide mechanisms, such as application styles or custom themes.
trans-unit.target: 因為使用者預期存取具有特定的外觀的索引鍵識別碼[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)]，較好的選擇是使用整個應用程式的機制，例如應用程式樣式或自訂佈景主題變更這個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets how the textual content of an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText" /> element is clipped if it overflows the line box.
trans-unit.target: 如果線條方塊中 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText" /> 項目的文字內容溢位，取得或設定其裁剪方式。

trans-unit.source: For more information and for a list of text trimming options, see <xref:System.Windows.TextTrimming>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，以及文字修剪選項的清單，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.TextTrimming>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the textual content of an <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText" /> element is wrapped if it overflows the line box.
trans-unit.target: 如果線條方塊中 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText" /> 項目的文字內容溢位，取得或設定是否換行。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.TextWrapping%2A> property of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText> to make a multiple-line label.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.TextWrapping%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText>讓多行標籤。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of child elements that are visual.
Returns an integer that represents the number of child elements that are visible.
trans-unit.target: 傳回整數，表示可見子項目的數目。
